Actions.Name: Read a template deployment operation
Actions.Description: Reads a particular resource group template deployment operation. This is useful for troubleshooting failed template deployments.

Actions.Name: Lists template deployment operations
Actions.Description: Lists all the template deployment operations. This is useful for troubleshooting failed template deployments.

Actions.Name: Cancel a template deployment
Actions.Description: Cancel a currently running template deployment. All pending template operations will be suspended.

Actions.Name: Create or update a template deployment
Actions.Description: Create or update a named resource group template deployment. A template and parameters are expected for the request to succeed.

Actions.Name: Delete template deployment
Actions.Description: Deletes a resource group template deployment. The resources will not be deleted; only the metadata about the template deployment.

Actions.Name: Export deployment template
Actions.Description: Exports a template from a past resource group deployment.

Actions.Name: Read a template deployment
Actions.Description: Reads a template deployment within a resource group.

Actions.Name: List template deployments
Actions.Description: Lists all the resource group template deployments. This operation is useful to know what has been provisioned thus far.

Actions.Name: Validate a template deployment
Actions.Description: Validates a deployment template. This operation does not have side effects and can be used to test a template deployment for syntax or logical errors.

Actions.Name: Read a resource in provider
Actions.Description: Reads a resource object.

Actions.Name: Invoke resource operation in provider
Actions.Description: Invokes an operation on an Azure resource.

Actions.Name: Read resource provider
Actions.Description: Reads a particular resource provider within the subscription.

Actions.Name: List resource providers
Actions.Description: Lists the resource providers available for the subscription.

Actions.Name: Register resource provider
Actions.Description: Registers a resource provider to be used with a subscription. This will provision permissions for the service into your subscription.

Actions.Name: Unregister resource provider
Actions.Description: Unregisters provider from a subscription. This operation will fail if there are any resources from that resource provider in the subscription.

Actions.Name: Create or update a resource group
Actions.Description: Creates or updates a resource group. The response code can be used to distinguish between a create (201) or update (200).

Actions.Name: Delete a resource group
Actions.Description: Delete a particular resource group within the subscription.

Actions.Name: Export a resource group template
Actions.Description: Exports a deployment template from an existing resource group. This can only be successful if the underlying resources have a schema defined by Microsoft.

Actions.Name: Read a resource group
Actions.Description: Reads a particular resource group within the subscription.

Actions.Name: List resource groups
Actions.Description: Lists all the resource groups within the subscription. The results are paginated at 1,000+ records.

Actions.Name: List resources by resource group
Actions.Description: Lists all the resources under a resource group.

Actions.Name: Update an existing resource group
Actions.Description: Updates an existing resource group. If the resource does not exist, this request will fail.

Actions.Name: Create or update a resource
Actions.Description: Creates or updates a resource. The response code can be used to distinguish between a create (201) or update (200).

Actions.Name: Delete a resource
Actions.Description: Deletes a resource.

Actions.Name: Read a resource
Actions.Description: Reads a resource object.

Actions.Name: Invoke resource operation
Actions.Description: Invokes an operation on an Azure resource.

Actions.Name: List resources by subscription
Actions.Description: Reads all of the resources under a particular subscription. The results are paginated at 1,000+ records.

Actions.Name: Read a subscription
Actions.Description: Reads the details for a particular subscription.

Actions.Name: List subscriptions
Actions.Description: Gets a list of all the subscriptions to which the principal has access.

Actions.Name: Lists the subscription locations
Actions.Description: Lists the locations available for the subscription.

Actions.Name: Create or update a subscription resource tag name
Actions.Description: Create or update a subscription resource tag name.

Actions.Name: Create or update a subscription resource tag value
Actions.Description: Create or update a subscription resource tag value.

Actions.Name: Delete a subscription resource tag name
Actions.Description: Delete a subscription resource tag name.

Actions.Name: Delete a subscription resource tag value
Actions.Description: Delete a subscription resource tag value.

Actions.Name: List subscription resource tags
Actions.Description: Lists all the subscription resource tags.
